title: [DocDB] yb-master LookupTabletPeer SIGSEGV

labels.name: kind/enhancement
labels.description: This is an enhancement of an existing feature

body:
Jira Link: [DB-14305](https://yugabyte.atlassian.net/browse/DB-14305)
### Description

```
* thread #1, name = 'yb-master', stop reason = signal SIGSEGV
  * frame #0: 0x0000aaaac66a8e74 yb-master`yb::tserver::LookupTabletPeer(yb::tserver::TabletPeerLookupIf*, std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char>> const&) [inlined] yb::tablet::RaftGroupStatePB std::__1::__cxx_atomic_load[abi:ue170006]<yb::tablet::RaftGroupStatePB>(__a=0x00000000000000b0, __order=acquire) at cxx_atomic_impl.h:363:12
    frame #1: 0x0000aaaac66a8e74 yb-master`yb::tserver::LookupTabletPeer(yb::tserver::TabletPeerLookupIf*, std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char>> const&) [inlined] std::__1::__atomic_base<yb::tablet::RaftGroupStatePB, false>::load[abi:ue170006](this=0x00000000000000b0, __m=acquire) const at atomic_base.h:60:14
    frame #2: 0x0000aaaac66a8e74 yb-master`yb::tserver::LookupTabletPeer(yb::tserver::TabletPeerLookupIf*, std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char>> const&) [inlined] yb::tablet::TabletPeer::state(this=<unavailable>) const at tablet_peer.h:276:19
    frame #3: 0x0000aaaac66a8e74 yb-master`yb::tserver::LookupTabletPeer(yb::tserver::TabletPeerLookupIf*, std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char>> const&) [inlined] yb::Result<yb::tserver::TabletPeerTablet> yb::tserver::(anonymous namespace)::DoLookupTabletPeer<std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char>>>(tablet_manager=<unavailable>, tablet_id="00000000000000000000000000000000") at service_util.cc:268:56
    frame #4: 0x0000aaaac66a8e30 yb-master`yb::tserver::LookupTabletPeer(tablet_manager=<unavailable>, tablet_id="00000000000000000000000000000000") at service_util.cc:293:10
    frame #5: 0x0000aaaac66ec454 yb-master`yb::tserver::TabletServiceImpl::UpdateTransaction(yb::tserver::UpdateTransactionRequestPB const*, yb::tserver::UpdateTransactionResponsePB*, yb::rpc::RpcContext) [inlined] yb::Result<yb::tserver::TabletPeerTablet> yb::tserver::LookupTabletPeerOrRespond<yb::tserver::UpdateTransactionResponsePB, std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char>>>(tablet_manager=<unavailable>, tablet_id=<unavailable>, resp=0x000036713fdb6458, context=0x0000ffffbbed67d0) at service_util.h:170:37
    frame #6: 0x0000aaaac66ec44c yb-master`yb::tserver::TabletServiceImpl::UpdateTransaction(this=0x000036713f928020, req=0x000036713fdb6420, resp=0x000036713fdb6458, context=RpcContext @ 0x0000ffffbbed67d0) at tablet_service.cc:1210:24
```


https://yugabyte.slack.com/archives/C4K1838GL/p1733156540398489
